code: @Manual{,   title = {urgenceAviR: Integrate birds abundances data},   author = {Matthieu Beaumont and Steve Vissault},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {http://insileco.io/urgenceAviR/}, }

title: Integrate birds abundances data
text: package designed gather bird surveys integrate . newly created database used assess environmental threat levels.

title: Integrate birds abundances data
code: # Install devtools if not already installed install.packages("devtools")  # Install urgenceAviR from GitHub devtools::install_github("insileco/urgenceAviR")

title: Retrieve eBird Data — get_ebird
text: Filters retrieves data eBird GeoDatabase file (.gdb) using SQL query.

title: Retrieve eBird Data — get_ebird
code: get_ebird(path = NULL, species = NULL, year = NULL, month = NULL, ...)

title: Retrieve eBird Data — get_ebird
text: path Character string specifying file path eBird GeoDatabase file (.gdb). species Character vector species names filter (e.g., "Snow Goose"). NULL, query filter species. year Integer vector years filter (e.g., 2012:2014). month Integer vector months filter (e.g., 4:5). NULL, query filter year . ... Additional arguments passed terra::query(), select selecting specific columns limit limit number rows returned.

title: Retrieve eBird Data — get_ebird
text: SpatVector object containing filtered eBird data.

title: Retrieve eBird Data — get_ebird
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Example: Retrieve data for Snow Goose in April and May of 2012-2014 get_ebird(   path = "path/to/ebird.gdb",   species = "Snow Goose",   year = 2012:2014,   month = 4:5 )  # Example: Retrieve only specific columns get_ebird(   path = "path/to/ebird.gdb",   species = "Snow Goose",   year = 2012,   select = c("COMMON_NAME", "OBSERVATION_DATE") )} # }

what: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
text: Functions clean process species codes DBF file, join metadata, optionally drop subspecies.

title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
code: get_species_codes(   species_path = external_files$species_codes$path,   metadata_path = external_files$species_metadata$path,   drop_subspecies = TRUE )

title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
text: species_path Path DBF file containing species codes. metadata_path Path CSV file containing metadata. drop_subspecies Logical, whether drop subspecies resulting data frame (default: TRUE).

title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
text: cleaned data frame species codes optional subspecies filtered .

title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
text: Clean Process Species Codes file contains functions clean process species codes DBF file, join metadata, optionally drop subspecies output.

title: Clean and Process Species Codes — get_species_codes
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ species_ref <- get_species_codes(  species_path = "data/CodesEspeces.dbf",   metadata_path = "data/metadata_species.csv",   drop_subspecies = TRUE ) } # }

title: Get species rank — get_species_rank
text: Get species rank based scientific name

title: Get species rank — get_species_rank
Get species rank — get_species_rank
text: scientific_name scientific name species ranked

title: Get species rank — get_species_rank
text: character string indicating rank: "genre", "subspecies", "species".

title: Get species rank — get_species_rank
